title: A chanchin hril chu ka duh
lyrics:
A chanchin hril chu ka duh,
Vana thil hriatloh chu;
Isua leh a ropuina
Leh a hmangaihna chu.
A chanchin hril chu ka duh,
A dik tih ka hriatin,
Ka duhnate a tilawm,
thil dang tihlawm theih loh.

A chanchin hril chu ka duh,
Ka hril chu a ropui ang;
Thawnthu hlui, chul ngai lo chu,
Isua hmangaihna thu.

A chanchin hril chu ka duh,
Mak lehzuala lang chu;
thil dang zawng zawng ai pawhin,
Leh ka mumang aiin.
A chanchin hril chu ka duh,
Ka tan sawtna tak chu;
Chu chu thu dik chu a ni,
Tunah ka hrilh a che.

A chanchin hril chu ka duh,
Sawi nawn a nuam a ni;
Ka hril apianga lang chu,
thil mak tak chu a ni.
A chanchin hril chu ka duh,
Mite hriat ngai loh chu,
Chhandamna thuchah a ni,
Pathian hnen ata chu.

A chanchin hril chu ka duh,
A that hretute chuan;
Riltam, tuihal tuar angin,
Hriat nawn an chak fo thin.
A ropuina thlir hunin,
Hla thar ka sak tur chu,
He thaw
nthu hlui hi a ni,
Ka duh em em fo chu.
